#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int st[10001000],arr[10001000];
int query(int ss, int se, int qs, int qe, int si)
{
	if (se < qs || ss > qe)
		return 0;

	if (qs <= ss && qe >= se)
		return st[si];


	int mid = (ss+se)/2;
	    return (query(ss, mid, qs, qe, 2*si+1) +
		query(mid+1, se, qs, qe, 2*si+2));
		
}
 
int updateValue(int ss, int se, int qs, int qe, int si,int val)
{
 	if (se < qs || ss > qe)
		return 0;

	if (qs==ss && qe==se)
	{	st[si]+=val;
	    return st[si];
    }

	int mid = (ss+se)/2;
	    updateValue(ss, mid, qs, qe, 2*si+1,val) ;
		updateValue(mid+1, se, qs, qe, 2*si+2,val);
		st[si]=st[2*si+1]+st[2*si+2];
}

int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    int n,max1=0;
    cin>>n;
    
    memset(st,0,10001000);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        cin>>arr[i];
        max1=max(arr[i],max1);
    }

    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
  	cout<<query(0,max1,0,arr[i]-1,0)<<" ";
    updateValue(0,max1,arr[i],arr[i],0,1);
    }
    cout<<"\n";
}
	return 0;
}
